short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that adds your current grades to the dashboard in Canvas LMS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension aims to replicate the "show grades" toggle option in the mobile app that for some reason doesn't exist on the website. This is NOT an official extension, just a random guy working on a fun and simple coding project in his spare time. Your grades are never sent to me as everything is handled on your computer. It uses the official Canvas API to grab your grades and overlays them on the dashboard's card view, so you'll want to make sure you set your dashboard view to "Card View" by clicking on the three vertical dots in the upper right corner and selecting the card view option.
